// src/pages/ChildrenMinistry.js import React from 'react'; import '../assets/styles/components-css/children-ministry.css'; // Updated CSS file path const ChildrenMinistry = () => { return (

))}

); }; const activities = [ { title: 'Sincre Milk', description: 'Join us for our nurturing program focused on the spiritual growth of our children.', icon: 'path/to/icon1.png' }, { title: 'Children Bible Studies', description: 'Every Wednesday, engage in meaningful discussions and learn about God\'s word.', icon: 'path/to/icon2.png' }, { title: 'Sunday Service', description: 'Our Sunday services are tailored for children to help them connect with God.', icon: 'path/to/icon3.png' }, { title: 'Latest Events', description: 'Stay updated on all our upcoming events and activities for children!', icon: 'path/to/icon4.png' }, ]; const events = [ 'Children\'s Picnic - Date: 12th October 2024', 'Bible Quiz Competition - Date: 19th October 2024', 'Christmas Play - Date: 25th December 2024', ]; export default ChildrenMinistry;
